answers.text: They can be complex in interaction, but efficient to imitate natural behaviors.
They generate data on all the relevant aspects to be studied, even those that are not contemplated at the beginning of the process.
They allow to interpret phenomena from the observation and interaction
They allow to have real data of the total of a population

initMessages: Simulations are a very versatile tool for understanding behaviors or systems.
They have various advantages. Select the ones that you consider in the list that you will find below.
name: Benefits of simulations
